thread.section_title: PC Game Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PC Game Supply | www.pcgamesupply.com
thread.title: Alescon Readymix (Maint Dept)
thread.title_full: PC Game Supply reviewed by Alescon Readymix (Maint Dept)

author: Alescon Readymix (Maint Dept)
title: Alescon Readymix (Maint Dept)
text: Bought a Nintendo eCard but i did not receive the code after an extended period of time. I required support and the staff were friendly enough to respond promptly and refund my balance since there was a glitch on system. However, on the second purchase attempt I was able to acquire my "working" code. Would recommend your service to anyone. Satisfied customer here.
